name: Hero Header
description: Generate a compelling hero section for your website with headline, subheadline, and call-to-action.

name: About Section
description: Create an engaging 'About Us' section highlighting your company or project story.

name: Features Section
description: Generate a section showcasing the main features or benefits of your product or service.

name: Testimonials
description: Create a testimonial section with quotes and ratings from satisfied customers.

name: Call to Action
description: Generate a strong call-to-action section to encourage user engagement or conversions.

name: Pricing Table
description: Create a responsive pricing table comparing different plans or offerings.

name: Blog Section
description: Generate a blog section layout with recent posts, images, and excerpts.

name: Contact Form
description: Create a user-friendly contact form section with fields, buttons, and instructions.

name: FAQ Section
description: Generate a frequently asked questions section with collapsible answers.

name: Footer
description: Create a footer section with links, social icons, and copyright information.
